page.title: 04TRADE
page.content: TRADE. In Churt there is a line of small shops.The butcher sells fresh meat,and cooked meats;there is a grocer's shop Some groceries,sweets,bread and cakes are sold at the village post office. The newsagent's shop sells small toys as well as stationary,cards,wrapping paper and all kinds of sweets.The hairdresser's specialise in cutting and styling women's hair.Miscellanea is a shop selling bathroom equipment in particular,but it is possible to obtain there almost any odds and ends for house and garden.Two antique shops display anything from old furniture to china and jewelry.Across the road from the line of shops is a garage selling petrol and cars,and doing repairs.At the village pub you can drink wine or beer.A chemical firm stores and distributes drums of chemicals.
